text: Leon Vitali (born Alfred Filibert Leon Vitali; 26 July 1948 â€“ 19 August 2022) was an English actor. He was known for his roles in Stanley Kubrick's movies and was his personal assistant. His best known role was as Lord Bullingdon in Barry Lyndon. Vitali died on 19 August 2022 in Los Angeles, California at the age of 74. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2022 deaths Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:People from Warwickshire
title: Leon Vitali
